Name: Wordle 2
About the game: Find the words by moving the mouse among the letters presented. There are a lot of themed exercises to choose from and they gradually increase the difficulty of the puzzle. Work hard with your head or use the clues you get from completing the daily puzzle. Available categories are: Insects, Car, Building, Chemistry, Music, Movie, Fish, Color, Ecology, House. Good game.
